quest.name: The First Stela: Of Ronkan Might
journal:
Qitarl Natl would convince you of the merits of his theory regarding Ronkan subjugation of the Qitari.
※The difficulty of this quest will be synced to your current level.

Convinced of the merits of Qitarl Natl's argument, you express your support for his theory of Ronkan subjugation of the Qitari, a vote of confidence that pleases the Qitari steward greatly. Grudgingly agreeing that his father may have a point, the Qitari youngling Chaqurl Qhotl agrees to assist in the restoration of the first stela.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.

Under your watchful eye, the Qitari artisans restore the first stela to Qitarl Natl's best interpretation of its former glory. Encouraged and heartened by reclaiming a vital piece of their legacy, the Stewards now pursue their excavation efforts with newfound zeal. Continue to lend them your aid in their efforts should you so desire.

dialogue.name: QITARLNATL
dialogue.text: Weathered as they are, the meaning behind the engravings on the first stela are quite clear. The first Ronkan emperor subjugated our ancestors by force and conscripted them into service.

dialogue.name: QITARLNATL
dialogue.text: There can be no doubting this. Surely you agree that my theory is far more logical than the faerie tale proposed by my son, yes?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: If you elect to vouch for Qitarl Natl's theory, the stela will be restored to reflect his interpretation of history. Proceed, and you will be unable to view the stela as Chaqurl Qhotl envisions it.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The rewards you receive and the content of the quests to follow will be the same regardless of the choice you make. You are free to choose the version of history you find most compelling.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: Will you lend your support to Qitarl Natl's theory of Ronkan history?

dialogue.name: QITARLNATL
dialogue.text: Splendid! I was quite certain that we would see eye to eye. With the ally of Ronka vouching for my theory, surely my fellow Qitari will be convinced of its accuracy.

dialogue.name: CHAQURLQHOTL
dialogue.text: If you are so convinced, then... Well, perhaps Father is right after all. In any event, I would be honored to assist in the restoration of the stela!

dialogue.name: QITARLNATL
dialogue.text: At long last, the task of restoring our ancestors' legacy can begin in earnest! Good madamsir, pray remain with us and see our life's work through to the end!

dialogue.name: QITARLNATL
dialogue.text: Without further ado, I shall call for the Stewards' most skilled artisans. Let the restoration begin at once!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The first stela has been restored, its engravings now clearly reflecting Qitarl Natl's theory of Ronkan subjugation.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Protected by the talisman fashioned for them by the Night's Blessed and heartened by rediscovering a piece of their heritage, the Stewards now pursue their excavation efforts with newfound zeal. Should you choose, continue to aid them in their cause.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The first stela has been restored, its engravings now clearly reflecting Chaqurl Qhotl's theory of Ronkan beneficence.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Protected by the talisman fashioned for them by the Night's Blessed and heartened by rediscovering a piece of their heritage, the Stewards now pursue their excavation efforts with newfound zeal. Should you choose, continue to aid them in their cause.
